title: bug splat problem
body:
my League hasn't had any problems after the patch until recently.
every time i join a game custom or normal it  goes through the champ select and everything else fine until load up it instantly bug splats i have tried all of the options given on the basic support page but i still cant find a fix... need help.

replies.body:
Bugsplats are often caused by malfunctioning drivers or windows problems. If you've already tried all the steps in our [Bugsplat guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), I recommend taking a look at the steps inside our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting). Those steps go over some additional solutions for the issues you're having. 

Let me know if you still have issues after working through those steps.
ok thanks i will give it a try
